name: Microwave Tuna Penne Plates with Greek Salad and Warm Ciabatta Rolls
description: Heat tuna penne, add ready Greek salad, and warm ciabatta rolls for a fast, no-heat family dinner. Fresh grapes round out the plate.
prep_steps: Set out 4 dinner plates and 4 small side bowls.
Open 4 tuna penne trays and peel back film as directed.
Open the greek salad tub and give it a quick toss.
Slice the ciabatta rolls if you prefer them halved.
Rinse the grapes and pull into small clusters for easy serving.
cook_steps: Microwave the tuna penne trays per pack directions (about 3–5 minutes each). Heat two at a time to save time; repeat for the remaining trays.
Warm the ciabatta rolls: microwave 20–30 seconds until soft, or optionally bake at 180°C/350°F for 3–5 minutes if you prefer a crust.
Plate each portion of tuna penne, add a generous scoop of greek salad to the side, and serve with a ciabatta roll.
Add a handful of grapes to each plate or serve in a shared bowl.
